pr_title: Allows `./gradlew clean build` to run successfully.

timeline.message:
Allows `./gradlew clean build` to run successfully.

For now the unsolved problem is code coverage verification. Several modules have significantly lower coverage than required by build. Thus this verification cannot be enabled until tests are improved.

timeline.author: iNikem

timeline.bodyText: Apparently symbol > is not allowed in javadoc
timeline.author: iNikem
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -42,7 +42,7 @@ *

* *

System properties are {@link Config#PREFIX}'ed. Environment variables are the same as the - * system property, but uppercased with '.' -> '_'. + * system property, but uppercased and '.' is replaced with '_'.

timeline.message:
Fix some sporadic test failures (#354)

* Fix some sporadic test failures

* Improve Jetty test advice

* Fix smore sporadic test failures

* Improve test consistency
FieldBackedProviderFieldInjectionDisabledTest was never run due to broken config (#347)
Restore jacocoTestCoverageVerification as part of check task
CI job `check` will run `build` gradle task
